acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

nonces(address).details: Returns the next unused nonce for an address.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._trustedCaller: The address of the new trusted caller

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner.

constructor.notice: Set the owner of the contract to the provided _initialOwner.

disableTrustedOnly().notice: Disable trustedOnly mode. Must be called by the contract's owner.

domainSeparatorV4().notice: Helper view to read EIP-712 domain separator.

hashTypedDataV4(bytes32).notice: Helper view to hash EIP-712 typed data onchain.

setTrustedCaller(address).notice: Change the trusted caller by calling this from the contract's owner.

useNonce().notice: Increase caller's nonce, invalidating previous signatures.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "TransferAndChangeRecovery(uint256 rid,address to,address recovery,uint256 nonce,uint256 deadline)"

arguments.value: TransferAndChangeRecovery(uint256 rid,address to,address recovery,uint256 nonce,uint256 deadline)

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "TransferAndChangeRecovery(uint256 rid,address to,address recovery,uint256 nonce,uint256 deadline)"

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "ChangeRecoveryAddress(uint256 rid,address from,address to,uint256 nonce,uint256 deadline)"

arguments.value: ChangeRecoveryAddress(uint256 rid,address from,address to,uint256 nonce,uint256 deadline)

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "ChangeRecoveryAddress(uint256 rid,address from,address to,uint256 nonce,uint256 deadline)"

documentation.text:
@notice Set the owner of the contract to the provided _initialOwner.
 @param _initialOwner Initial owner address.
@dev Transfer the rid to another address without checking invariants.
@dev Change recovery address without checking invariants.
